### VDK-INGEST-HTTP PluginThis plugin provides functionality to ingest data over http.### UsageTo use the plugin, just install it, and set the `method` attribute of `send_object_for_ingestion()`,and `send_tabular_data_for_ingestion()` functions to _"http"_.Example:```pythondef run(job_input: IJobInput): # Do something to get data for ingestion payload = get_some_data() # Ingest the data job_input.send_object_for_ingestion(payload=payload, destination_table="aa_test_table", method="http", target="http://example.com/data-source" )```The above example shows how to ingest json data. In this case, there are three arguments that are required: `payload`,`method` and `target`. This would be fixed in the future, so that only `payload` would be required.
The payload needs to be a json object, and should contain the `destination_table` inside, using the `@table` key. For example:```{ "@table": "destination_table_name", "column1": "value1", "column2": "value2", "column3": "value3",}```The `method` attribute needs to be provided for the time being.
The `target` attribute should specify the url endpoint, where the data will be ingested.### TestingTo develop or test locally (from the current directory)```bash# install dev and test dependenciespip install -r requirements# install the plugin in editable modepip install -e .# run the testspytest```
